translations: （公开地）严厉斥责，谴责（censure 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: I want to ask, encounter an user when you when censuring, meet very grievance?
sentences.translation: 我想问，当你碰到用户的指责的时候，是不是会很委屈？

sentences.sentence: I would wish not to be hasty in censuring any one; but I always speak what I think.
sentences.translation: 我倒希望不要轻易责难一个人，可是我一向都是想到什么就说什么。

sentences.sentence: Because a nobody I'm censuring today could become the somebody I will be following tomorrow.
sentences.translation: 因为说不准哪天，我在嘲笑的小人物会变成对我呼来喝去的大人物。
